ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I get angry if people do not do things my way
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I sometimes bore others as I go on to an excess about some things
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I get upset if other people disturb my plans for the day by being late
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I have difficulty making decisions
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: When others suggest a new way of doing things, I get upset or unsettled
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I find it difficult to remember the story line in films, plays or books, but can remember specific scenes in great detail
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Once I get into an emotional state, e.g., anger or sadness, it is very difficult to soothe myself
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I spend as much time on more or less important tasks
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I like to make plans about complex arrangements, e.g., journeys and work projects
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I can get hung up on details when reading rather than understanding the gist
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I have high levels of anxiety/discomfort: I can see/feel/taste that things might not be quite right
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I tend to focus on one thing at a time and get it out of proportion to the total situation
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I like doing things in a particular order or routine
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I can get lost in the details and forget the real purpose of a task
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription:
I can be called stubborn or single minded as it is difficult to shift
from one point of view to another
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I find it difficult to do several things at once (multitasking)
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I need clarity and rules when facing a new situation. Without rules, I easily feel lost
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I find it hard to see different perspectives of a situation
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I get very distressed if plans get changed at the last minute
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I can get overwhelmed by too many details
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I dislike change
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I depend on others to help me get things into perspective, as I tend to have a rather blinkered view on things in my life
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I often feel vulnerable and unsafe as I am unable to see threats (or opportunities) that are out of my field of vision
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I find it hard to write concisely: I often overrun word limits and find it difficult to decide which details can be left out
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Slightly Disagree; 4= Slightly Agree; 5= Agree; 6= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: DFLEX Total Score
Attention to Detail Score
Attentional Switching Score
Cognitive Rigidity Score
